line.comment: * $ships = get ship array: of race [Player] class/type=[Moveable Ship]
* $ships = get ship array: of race $race class/type=[Moveable Ship]

line.text: 'Our empire gets perceived as a proper nation.'
' Good reputation no longer protects us against other factions who want to enforce their strategic interests by war.'
' WARNING: there are factions who secretly despise us because we own their dejure sectors!'
' WARNING: neighbor factions already got tempted to declare war on us because we own so many sectors without having an appropriate military force!'
' But you are playing on a difficulty setting where this has no effect. On higher difficulties other factions would be allowed to declare war on you at this point.'
' can never declare war on us because they are our coalition ally.'
' heritage they are much less likely to declare war on us, but its not impossible.'
'For the public we are just some private organisation. Nobody believes that we secretly strive to dominate the galaxy.'
' If we become more powerful other factions will eventually discover our true ambitions and might try to stop us.'
' Our growing military strength has already raised some suspicion.'
' Our aggressive territorial expansion has already raised some suspicion.'
' Our large cash reserves have already raised some suspicion.'
' Our large stockpile of ship parts has already raised some suspicion.'

sval.val: Our empire gets perceived as a proper nation.
Good reputation no longer protects us against other factions who want to enforce their strategic interests by war.
WARNING: there are factions who secretly despise us because we own their dejure sectors!
WARNING: neighbor factions already got tempted to declare war on us because we own so many sectors without having an appropriate military force!
But you are playing on a difficulty setting where this has no effect. On higher difficulties other factions would be allowed to declare war on you at this point.
can never declare war on us because they are our coalition ally.
heritage they are much less likely to declare war on us, but its not impossible.
For the public we are just some private organisation. Nobody believes that we secretly strive to dominate the galaxy.
If we become more powerful other factions will eventually discover our true ambitions and might try to stop us.
Our growing military strength has already raised some suspicion.
Our aggressive territorial expansion has already raised some suspicion.
Our large cash reserves have already raised some suspicion.
Our large stockpile of ship parts has already raised some suspicion.
$ships = get ship array: of race [Player] class/type=[Moveable Ship]
